DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if Atorvastatin can improve blood vessel stiffness and blood vessel function in children 10-18 years old with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes. Subjects will receive atorvastatin 20mg or placebo daily for 3 months and will then switch therapies for the next 3 months. Hypothesis: Atorvastatin will improve blood vessel function by decreasing arterial stiffness and improving blood flow.
DOC.brief_title: Pediatric Atorvastatin in Diabetes Intervention Trial (PADIT)
DOC.criteria: Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus (T1DM) or Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (T2DM) for more than 1 year Age 1018 years. Cardiovascular disease (CVD) Liver disease Pregnancy Use of cholesterol or triglyceride lowering drugs Perceived inability to comply with the study protocol Endocrinopathy other than diabetes
